com.microfocus.adm.pulse.pluginapi.event

Interface PulseEmailBuilder


  • public interface PulseEmailBuilder

    Used to create emails that will be sent using PulseEmailService.

    The same builder can be used to create multiple emails.

    Each property setter returns this builder allowing property calls to be chained together, e.g. builder.to(Arrays.asList("dmsys", "dawn")).subject("message subject").body("message body").build()

    At least one recipient which is Pulse login name must be provided in to(List) or cc(List) or bcc(List) methods to successfully build an email. Attempting to build an email with no recipients will result in an IllegalStateException being thrown by the build() method.

    Since:
    19.1.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PulseEmailBuilder bcc(List<String> recipients)
      Set the list of recipients from Pulse users for whom this email will be sent in the BCC emails field.
      PulseEmailBuilder body(String body)
      Set the message body that will be sent to Pulse users for this email.
      PulseEmail build()
      Create a new PulseEmail using the current properties of this builder.
      PulseEmailBuilder cc(List<String> recipients)
      Set the list of recipients from Pulse users for whom this email will be sent in the CC emails field.
      PulseEmailBuilder subject(String subject)
      Set the message subject that will be sent to Pulse users for this email.
      PulseEmailBuilder to(List<String> recipients)
      Set the list of recipients from Pulse users for whom this email will be sent in the TO emails field.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        PulseEmail build()

        Create a new PulseEmail using the current properties of this builder.

        Returns:
        New PulseEmail. Can not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - thrown if the PulseEmail recipient doesn't provided.
        Since:
        19.1.1

      • to

        PulseEmailBuilder to(List<String> recipients)

        Set the list of recipients from Pulse users for whom this email will be sent in the TO emails field. At least one recipient must be provided in #to(List) or cc(List) or bcc(List) methods to successfully build an email. Attempting to build an email with no recipients will result in an IllegalStateException being thrown by the build() method.

        Parameters:
        recipients - List of recipients from Pulse login names to send.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow chaining.
        Since:
        19.1.1

      • cc

        PulseEmailBuilder cc(List<String> recipients)

        Set the list of recipients from Pulse users for whom this email will be sent in the CC emails field. At least one recipient must be provided in to(List) or #cc(List) or bcc(List) methods to successfully build an email. Attempting to build an email with no recipients will result in an IllegalStateException being thrown by the build() method.

        Parameters:
        recipients - List of recipients from Pulse login names to send.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow chaining.
        Since:
        19.1.1

      • bcc

        PulseEmailBuilder bcc(List<String> recipients)

        Set the list of recipients from Pulse users for whom this email will be sent in the BCC emails field. At least one recipient must be provided in {to(List) or cc(List) or #bcc(List) methods to successfully build an email. Attempting to build an email with no recipients will result in an IllegalStateException being thrown by the build() method.

        Parameters:
        recipients - List of recipients from Pulse login names to send.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow chaining.
        Since:
        19.1.1

      • subject

        PulseEmailBuilder subject(String subject)

        Set the message subject that will be sent to Pulse users for this email.

        Parameters:
        subject - Subject of email message to be sent.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow chaining.
        Since:
        19.1.1

      • body

        PulseEmailBuilder body(String body)

        Set the message body that will be sent to Pulse users for this email. The body message allows HTML or Plain text. The message has limit on the length of the body in 1MB. Attempting to build an email with body size greater then 1MB will result in truncated message to 1MB.

        Parameters:
        body - Body of email message to be sent.
        Returns:
        This builder to allow chaining.
        Since:
        19.1.1
